TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContactManager extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class ContactManager Implements IDisposable
public ref class ContactManager sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 代表 Windows 通訊錄中所保存的 物件之集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects which persist in a Windows Address Book.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別有沒有公用建構函式，因為它的參考由類別。This class has no public constructors, since a reference to it is returned by the class. 相關聯的通訊錄管理包括在 對等主應用程式與遠端對等電腦相關聯。Address books that are associated with management include those associated with the host peer and a remote peer. 任何一部電腦可能會與其他對等，共同作業遠端對等，但不是主對等的本機對等電腦時，可以新增至主對等。Either computer may collaborate with other peers; when a peer is local to the remote peer but not the host peer, it can be added to the of the host peer. 某些作業類別，例如和、 相互關聯到相關聯的 Windows 通訊錄的遠端對等上所執行的作業。Certain operations on the class, such as and , correlate to the associated operations being performed on the Windows Address book of the remote peer. 主對等可存取此永續性儲存體可以在其中顯示想要參與的對等的應用程式與相關聯的資訊。The host peer has access to this persistent storage for information, which can be associated with the applications in which a peer intends to participate. A識別本身的使用者身分的電腦上的持續性存放區。A can identify itself as a user of a persistent store on a computer. ## Examples 下列範例程式碼說明如何列舉並將其加入為至本機:The following example code illustrates how to enumerate a and add it as a to the local : [!code-csharp[NCLPNRPContacts#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLPNRPContacts/CS/NCLPNRPContacts.cs#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為訂用帳戶每位使用者並不是依處理序或應用程式定義域，另一個主機上執行的應用程式也可能導致引發此事件。Since subscriptions are per user and not per process or per application domain, another application running on the host may also cause this event to be raised. 本項目要求的。This event requires a of .

summary.span: 當屬性值設定後，因非同步作業而未引發的所有事件都會有建立該特定 之執行緒上回呼的相關事件處理常式。

span.span: When this property value is set, all events not fired as the result of an asynchronous operation will have the associated event handlers called back on the thread that created the specific .

value.span: 實作 介面的物件，且由這個型別的執行個體在建立事件處理常式的執行緒上，用來同步處理事件處理常式。

span.span: Object that implements the interface and is used by instances of this type for event handler synchronization on the thread that created it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性的預設設定的值`null`，指出所有事件處理常式會都呼叫系統執行緒集區執行緒上。The default set value for this property is `null`, indicating that all event handlers are called on a system thread pool thread. 此屬性通常這類設定的 UI 元素執行個體。This property is typically set to a UI element such as a instance.
